column4: can one of you uber guys pm me for some install help? i'm trying to wipe drive and clean install, but keep running into issues. i'm not a total noob
upon booting livecd, and choosing install, it locks up at different points each time, and upon choosing 'try...' [aka livecd] it asks for login
tried tty1-6, they all say user not known to the underlying auth module
